## Rectangle.Empty property

Gets a new instance of the [`Rectangle`](../../rectangle) structure that has [`X`](../x), [`Y`](../y), [`Width`](../width) and [`Height`](../height) values set to zero.

```csharp
public static Rectangle Empty { get; }
```
